description:
Natsumi asks Komari if she wants to come along on a trip to the department store, but Komari isn`t in the mood. Natsumi tells her that ghosts will come out if she stays home alone, but Komari insists that ghosts aren`t real and that they wouldn`t come out during the day anyway. Komari later gets hungry while staying at home alone, so she goes to the kitchen for a snack, but then she suddenly hears a faint sound behind her, and when she turns to look...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: おいしいごはんを作った
